author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/lies-of-p/

Cross the bounds of time in Lies of P: Overture, a dramatic prequel that transports you back to Krat in its unseen grandeur on the verge of collapse. Follow the path of the Legendary Stalker, uncover hidden secrets, and endure relentless battles that will define the past and future of Lies of P.

Rated Mature

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #liesofp
title: Lies of P: Overture - Story Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
despelote is coming May 1st! https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10007987

Despelote is a soccer game about people. Get immersed in the streets and parks of Quito through the eyes and ears of eight year old Julián. Dribble, pass and shoot your soccer ball around town, and see what happens when you kick it someone's way. Feel the city change as Ecuador comes closer than ever to qualifying for the World Cup.  

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Despelote - Release Date Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011892

In #TheLonesomeGuild, lead a quirky cast in this single-player ARPG full of heart (and battles!) where friendship is key.

In a world consumed by loneliness, only friendship can save the day. Lead Ghost and six misfits through the vibrant world of Etere, where bonds aren’t just emotional—they shape your strength. Seamlessly switch between your characters in battle and exploration, forging bonds that unlock powerful combos and heartfelt moments by the campfire. Enjoy dynamic combat, puzzle-solving, and a world brimming with secrets. 

The Lonesome Guild is developed by Tiny Bull Studios and published by DON’T NOD and will release later this year on PlayStation 5.  

The world might be lonely, but you don't have to be!

WISHLIST NOW:  
PS Store: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10011892

#ps5 #ps5games
title: The Lonesome Guild - Reveal Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
A T-1000, advanced prototype. A mimetic polyalloy. Liquid metal. Available in #MK1 starting March 18.

Character available with Khaos Reigns Expansion, Bundle, or Kollection. 

Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns expands Liu Kang’s New Era with a new story campaign and an all-new cinematic experience. Discover how Liu Kang rallies his champions and puts faith in his enemies as he battles the ruthless Titan Havik, who threatens to plunge the realms into khaos. If they fail, the New Era will be reduced to anarchy. 

Pre-Order Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns today  

 #ps5 #ps5games #mortalkombat1khaosreigns 

Rated Mature
title: Mortal Kombat 1: Khaos Reigns - T-1000 First Look Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
A day passing as slowly as a village brook? That’s not in Will’s dictionary. Sure, you might get a moment to polish the goods on display or tweak your shop’s decor—but once those doors swing open and customers start pouring in, it’s all about charm, shopkeeper’s strategy, and the fine art of the haggle. But when the last deal is struck and the business day ends, there’s no time for a well-earned nap. That’s when adventure begins!

With Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault, a new array of challenges unfolds. New mechanics, an expanded arsenal of weapons and gear, uncharted biomes teeming with treasures and enemies to vanquish in combat, and a fresh story to uncover—Will and his companions find themselves stranded in the mysterious village of Tresna, trapped in a dimension far from home. To get back, they’ll need to master both trade and blade. Coming to PlayStation!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault - A New Journey Unfolds | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Blue Prince is coming to PlayStation®5 and PS+ Game Catalogue on April 10th. Immerse yourself in a genre-bending, atmospheric, architectural adventure where you explore an ever-changing manor of 45 shifting rooms.
 
In Blue Prince, you embark on a genre-defying experience, filled with a unique mix of mystery, strategy, and puzzles that weave together to create an unpredictable journey. Will your explorative steps lead you to the rumored Room 46?

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Blue Prince - Date Reveal | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/monster-hunter-wilds/

Step into the ever-changing Forbidden Lands, where the ferocious monsters, shifting environments, and long-dormant threats destroy nature's delicate balance. 
 
Heed the call of the wilds and become a hunter when Monster Hunter Wilds launches on February 28. 
------- 
About Monster Hunter Wilds 
Monster Hunter Wilds is the next generation of the acclaimed Monster Hunter series. 
 
You are a monster hunter, protecting the balance of the ecosystem and hunting monsters in a world with dynamic, ever-changing environments. Use the resources you gain from hunts to craft ever more powerful weapons and armor in your quest to unravel the mysteries of the new lands. 
 
Experience the most evolved action and improved immersion in the series when Monster Hunter Wilds arrives on February 28, 2025. 

#ps5 #ps5games #monsterhunterwilds
title: Monster Hunter Wilds - "The Wilds are Calling" Live Action Trailer | PS5 Games

Revealed during today’s Annapurna Interactive Showcase, Simogo’s acclaimed action rhythm game, Sayonara Wild Hearts, is out NOW on PlayStation 5 for $12.99 USD. author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10013020

Restore sports facilities to their former glory in Sports: Renovations, a relaxing story-driven simulator! LAUNCHING MARCH 27th, 2025 to PS5 🎉  
Renovate gyms and pitches, upgrade your tools, complete side quests, and earn enough money to save your hometown court !🛠️✨

🏀 What is Sports: Renovations about?
Your hometown basketball court may be demolished! How do you save the place? Do what you do best! Grab your tools, roll up your sleeves and breathe some life into other old sports facilities to earn money. See the spaces normally unavailable to normal visitors. Learn the inner workings of sports and listen to fascinating tales about their history. And when you’ve earned enough, step up and renovate your hometown’s court for a rewarding endgame.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Sports: Renovations - Release Date Trailer I PS5 Games
